attributes.title: Surprise for Grandma I
attributes.description: I met a close friend of Grandma's yesterday and I've invited her to come over tomorrow. However, Grandma doesn't know yet, please keep it as a surprise for her.

attributes.title: Surprise for Grandma I
attributes.description: Luckily, Grandma's friend accepted the invitation. I want to make sure this reunion is something that Grandma will never forget!

attributes.title: Surprise for Grandma II
attributes.description: I know Grandma hasn't seen this old friend for a very long time so I want to make this really special, will you help me?

attributes.title: Surprise for Grandma II
attributes.description: The blue and red roses look so beautiful and they will make lovely decorations.

attributes.title: Surprise for Grandma III
attributes.description: Oh, I almost forgot! Grandma's friend loves the candy we make. Let's make some before she arrives.

attributes.title: Surprise for Grandma III
attributes.description: The candy we made looks so colorful. I bet no one will notice if I steal one hehe...

attributes.title: Surprise for Grandma IV
attributes.description: Grandma's friend always brings gifts when she comes over. I want to turn the tables this time and make her a gift to give her instead!

attributes.text: Produce 70 bundles of Wool to make new gloves

attributes.title: Surprise for Grandma IV
attributes.description: The gloves are done and they look beautiful. I hope Grandma's friend will like them!

attributes.title: Surprise for Grandma V
attributes.description: I'm sure Grandma and her friend will have a lot to talk about. I better start preparing a nice cake for them.

attributes.title: Surprise for Grandma V
attributes.description: The preparations for the cake are all done now. However, now comes the hardest part. I only have one chance to make the perfect cake!

attributes.title: Surprise for Grandma VI
attributes.description: Let me think, what cake should I make.. I know! I saw some really nice Gisela Cherries when I was walking around on the farm this morning. Let's make some Cherry Flan!

attributes.title: Surprise for Grandma VI
attributes.description: The Cherry Flan looks perfect, I am so happy! I can't wait to let Grandma and her friend have a try!

attributes.title: Surprise for Grandma VII
attributes.description: Hmm, maybe Grandma's friend will bring her grandchildren to play on the farm. I better prepare some Lychee Scones for them.

attributes.title: Surprise for Grandma VII
attributes.description: We're all done! You didn't tell Grandma, did you? I am sure she will like the surprise we have prepared for her!

attributes.title: The Wedding I
attributes.description: Big news! The mayor from our town is going to get married and he wants to have his wedding on our farm! Everyone in town is talking about it, there's a lot to do so we better start our preparations now!

attributes.title: The Wedding I
attributes.description: Great! The flower packing machine has arrived just in time. Now we can make some beautiful bouquets for the wedding.

attributes.title: The Wedding II
attributes.description: This is going to be the biggest wedding of our town. We will need a lot of flowers for decoration. Luckily we have a flower packing machine now so we can make our own bouquets of flowers.

attributes.text: Add 3 Red Roses to the Flower Packing Machine

attributes.title: The Wedding II
attributes.description: This machine is so convenient and it's really easy to use. All the bouquets look beautiful.

attributes.title: The Wedding III
attributes.description: Did you know that you can't throw rice at weddings anymore? Too bad, because it's so much fun. But I want to keep this tradition alive! Do you think we can use apple candies instead?

attributes.text: Produce 40 Apple Candies to throw to the couple

attributes.title: The Wedding III
attributes.description: I think we have enough apple candies to throw over the wedding couple.

attributes.title: The Wedding IV
attributes.description: Is it me or do the decorations seem a bit dull with only red roses? Maybe we should add some blue roses as well. We will also need to make some wine for the guests.

attributes.title: The Wedding IV
attributes.description: Great, the decorations look much more colorful now. The blue and red roses match really well.

attributes.title: The Wedding V
attributes.description: The mayor has asked us to record the whole wedding. I already know where I want to place the cameras. What do you think of a tree arch for the wedding couple to walk through?

attributes.text: Place a Tree Arch on your Farm
Collect 10 Cameras to record the wedding

attributes.title: The Wedding V
attributes.description: That's an excellent spot you chose to place the tree arch, good work! All the cameras are installed and we're ready to go.

attributes.title: The Wedding VI
attributes.description: I hope it will be a wonderful sunny day for the big day. We should prepare some fruits for our guests and I know the perfect fruit to serve on a wedding!

attributes.title: The Wedding VI
attributes.description: Love fruit has got to be the perfect kind of fruit for a wedding! Don't you agree?

attributes.title: The Wedding VII
attributes.description: We need to make sure that everything is perfect on this wedding day. I want to add a soft carpet as a finishing touch for the bride and groom to walk down the aisle.

attributes.text: Harvest 80 Daisies to make Flower Rings
Produce 80 bundles of Angora Hair to make soft carpet

attributes.title: The Wedding VII
attributes.description: We did it! Everything's settled for the biggest wedding in our town. I'm a bit nervous, however I'm also really looking forward to it!

attributes.title: Movie Night I
attributes.description: Grandma and Felicia have worked really hard, I want to surprise them by arranging a special movie night for them! I don't really know how to cook so I'll just start with some jam sandwiches.

attributes.title: Movie Night I
attributes.description: Mmm, the jam tastes delicious! However this is not enough, I need to prepare more food!

attributes.title: Movie Night II
attributes.description: Great! I found a recipe book in the attic and the recipes don't look too difficult to make. In fact, it all looks very easy, even I can do it! I bet I can make some sausages and hamburgers.

attributes.title: Movie Night II
attributes.description: Oops, some burgers and sausages ended up too burnt so I had to throw them away. However these ones look nice, I think..

attributes.title: Movie Night III
attributes.description: They say that practice makes perfect, so if I keep making dishes I will become better and better in cooking. Sausages and burgers are way too easy for me now, time to take on a difficult dish!

attributes.title: Movie Night III
attributes.description: I thought cooking is easy, however it's so hard. I don't want to cook anymore, let's do something else that's easier.

attributes.title: Movie Night IV
attributes.description: This recipe book also has a section for drinks! That's perfect, now I can also make some drinks to go with the food. I hope it's easier than cooking..

attributes.title: Movie Night IV
attributes.description: Guess what? I didn't follow the recipe in the book. I used our wine maker instead. Smart of me, right?

attributes.title: Movie Night V
attributes.description: I'm starting to get thirsty from all this hard work. I better make some juice for myself!

attributes.title: Movie Night V
attributes.description: Ahh, this grape juice is very refreshing on this hot day! I better not drink it all and save some for tonight.

attributes.title: Movie Night VI
attributes.description: A friend of mine once taught me how to make nice decorations only using feathers and a hair grip. She wrote it down for me, but I cannot find it. Ah well, let's collect the feathers first and find the instructions later!

attributes.title: Movie Night VI
attributes.description: Great, I have the feathers. Now where did I put my friend's paper with the instructions..?

attributes.title: Movie Night VII
attributes.description: Oh no, I think I lost the instructions.. I will ask my friend again another time. I still have some time left, so maybe I can make a bouquet for Felicia and one for Grandma.

attributes.title: Movie Night VII
attributes.description: I made the daisy bouquet for Felicia and the lavender bouquet for Grandma. I hope they'll like it!

attributes.title: The Campfire I
attributes.description: The kids these days all have those big headphones to listen to music. But I think music should be used to create bonding between people, like my band. If only I could get my hands on some more musical instruments..

attributes.title: The Campfire I
attributes.description: The neighbors were so nice to lend me their guitar. I owe them, that's for sure!

attributes.title: The Campfire II
attributes.description: I just got a brilliant idea! Why don't we invite some friends and organize a campfire. That should be fun, right? Let's prepare some food.

attributes.title: The Campfire II
attributes.description: I only made vegetarian hamburgers for a change. I hope everyone will like it.

attributes.title: The Campfire III
attributes.description: We will need other musical instruments as well beside the guitars. I think a mandolin is always nice around a camp fire. Can you help me to get a few mandolins?

attributes.title: The Campfire III
attributes.description: Thanks! The mandolins all look and sound so beautiful. You did a great job!

attributes.title: The Campfire IV
attributes.description: Hmm, I'm scared that some people might not like the veggie burgers. Especially the kids. Just to be sure I'll quickly make some jam sandwiches.

attributes.title: The Campfire IV
attributes.description: All the sandwiches are made, we have more than enough for everyone.

attributes.title: The Campfire V
attributes.description: We need a beat for the music, let's try to get some drums so the children can also join in with the music.

attributes.title: The Campfire V
attributes.description: Excellent! The drums have arrived, I hope the kids will like them.

attributes.title: The Campfire VI
attributes.description: The singing and dancing around the camp fire will definitely make people feel thirsty so I will prepare some drinks.

attributes.title: The Campfire VI
attributes.description: That should be more than enough Champagne. I'm really looking forward to our fancy camp fire party!

attributes.title: The Campfire VII
attributes.description: Our neighbors helped us out so much by lending us all their instruments. In order to show them our appreciation, we should do something for them.

attributes.title: The Campfire VII
attributes.description: We have such a lovely neighbors. We helped them a bit on their farms and they gave us even more instruments. Fantastic!

attributes.title: Felicia's Interview I
attributes.description: Today a reporter from our local newspaper will come and interview us! I haven't even finished tomorrow's orders yet and I am worried If I don't finish it it won't give him a good impression of our farm.

attributes.text: Sell 80 Cheddar Cheese from the Barn
Sell 80 Buffalo Milk Cheese from the Barn

attributes.title: Felicia's Interview I
attributes.description: Just finished it in time! I guess we showed the reporter that our farm knows how to get orders done in time!

attributes.title: Felicia's Interview II
attributes.description: The reporter is impressed by our farm and guess what, he wants to hold a birthday party for his boss on our farm and write a column about it! Let's get some drinks ready for the party!

attributes.text: Sell 90 bottles of Champagne from the Barn
Sell 90 glasses of Grape Juice from the Barn

attributes.title: Felicia's Interview II
attributes.description: Plenty of drinks will be available! I am sure the party will be a great success!

attributes.title: Felicia's Interview III
attributes.description: What's a party without food? Let's make some party snacks! They will love our food and we will become famous haha.

attributes.text: Sell 60 Turkey Burgers from the Barn
Sell 60 Veggie Burgers from the Barn

attributes.title: Felicia's Interview III
attributes.description: The sight of all those hamburgers makes me feel hungry! But no! I can't have a taste as these burgers are for the reporter's friends!

attributes.title: Felicia's Interview IV
attributes.description: Stupid me! I completely forgot to make sauce for the hamburgers. Everyone knows a hamburger without sauce is rubbish! Let's make some ketchup and mayonnaise!

attributes.title: Felicia's Interview IV
attributes.description: Luckily we still had some of the products to make these sauces in storage.

attributes.title: Felicia's Interview V
attributes.description: A birthday without cake is like a sea without fish! Let's make some cakes for the birthday boy and his guests!

attributes.text: Sell 10 Banana Cakes from the Barn
Sell 15 Black Forest Cakes from the Barn
Collect 10 Cake Boxes from your neighbors

attributes.title: Felicia's Interview V
attributes.description: I'm sure he will like these cakes. Who doesn't like to eat cake on their birthday?

attributes.title: Felicia's Interview VI
attributes.description: Yikes, I almost forgot to prepare the jam Grandma Blair needs to take to her Bingo night. If she has already gone, we can at least party until midnight!

attributes.text: Sell 90 Jars of Pitaya Jam from the Barn
Sell 90 jars of Blackberry Jam from the Barn

attributes.title: Felicia's Interview VI
attributes.description: Luckily Grandma Blair didn't notice I almost forgot to make her Jam! That would have been embarrassing and I would have been in trouble.

attributes.title: Felicia's Interview VII
attributes.description: The reporter also asked whether we could help his newspaper raise money to help look after rescued dogs.

attributes.text: Sell 100 Ostrich Feathers from the Barn
Sell 100 Peacock Feathers from the Barn
Collect 10 Vacuum Bags from your neighbors

attributes.title: Felicia's Interview VII
attributes.description: Perfect! With all this money, a lot of rescued dogs can be given a wonderful and loving home.

attributes.title: Felicia's Interview VIII
attributes.description: The newspaper was so impressed with how much we raised, they have asked us to help them one more time. Can you do that?

attributes.text: Sell 100 bundles of Wool from the Barn
Sell 80 bundles of Angora Hair from the Barn
Sell 80 Goose Feathers from the Barn

attributes.title: Felicia's Interview VIII
attributes.description: Thank you very much for the contribution, it's very appreciated! Now let's get ready for the birthday party!

attributes.title: Felicia's Interview IX
attributes.description: Oh my god! I saw the invitation list, his boss has a lot of friends and our farm can't fit all his guests in at the moment.

attributes.title: Felicia's Interview IX
attributes.description: Great! The farm is big enough now! Let's party hard!

attributes.title: Farm Foresight I
attributes.description: Today is such a beautiful day, Felicia has decided to paint scenes from around the Farm onto canvas. Maybe we can sell them on the next Farmers' Fair! But she has run out of green paint. Hmm, I have an idea. Care to help?

attributes.title: Farm Foresight I
attributes.description: Ha! Now she can make even more paints and will never have to worry about green paint again, haha!

attributes.title: Farm Foresight II
attributes.description: You know what would make this Farm even prettier? Flowers! I've already finished most of the farm tasks, so how about we plant some more? The bees and butterflies will love it!

attributes.title: Farm Foresight II
attributes.description: While working on the Farm you always have to plan ahead! Never forget to plan ahead, Farmer.

attributes.title: Farm Foresight III
attributes.description: Oh I forgot one of my farm tasks. I promised to harvest some cotton and sent it to my dad on the Island Farm. He is already preparing for winter! Smart. I don't want to freeze in the cold, maybe we should also prepare some cotton.

attributes.title: Farm Foresight III
attributes.description: That should be enough. Give the rest to grandma, I bet she can make something out of it!

attributes.title: Farm Foresight IV
attributes.description: Wanna know grandma's secret to long life? Healthy food! Look at the fields and you will understand. And you will understand even better when you help me harvest them. Thank you Farmer!

attributes.title: Farm Foresight IV
attributes.description: Thank you for your help! Today was a truly successful day.

attributes.title: Brave Explorer I
attributes.description: Last night dad told me a great bedtime story... I don't remember all the details but it was something about exploring caves! Let's go on an adventure!

attributes.title: Brave Explorer I
attributes.description: There is a cave not far from the Lighthouse. Let me pack up a map, a compass and some food then I'm ready to go!

attributes.title: Brave Explorer II
attributes.description: So in the story there were a couple of brave explorers looking for a treasure hidden in a forgotten cave!

attributes.title: Brave Explorer II
attributes.description: Well, there are no monsters on our way, but we can have a pretend fight with that tree! Here, you can have my spare wooden sword.

attributes.title: Brave Explorer III
attributes.description: Phew! That was close, the monster almost got us! Luckily I know aikido, karate and other martial arts! That tree... erm, that monster didn't stand a chance!

attributes.title: Brave Explorer III
attributes.description: We're almost at the cave, but what adventure only lasts 20 minutes? Let's have a break for food! Explorers like us need lots of energy!

attributes.title: Brave Explorer IV
attributes.description: Oh no... I think I ate too much and I don't really feel like going anywhere right now... Hmm, why don't you go first and I'll take a little nap here?

attributes.title: Brave Explorer IV
attributes.description: Fine, fine! I'm coming! There'd better be a treasure in this cave though!

attributes.title: Brave Explorer V
attributes.description: I searched the cave long and wide, but the only things resembling treasure were these colorful feathers... Wait, I guess Felicia could use them for her DIY earrings! Mission accomplished, treasure located!

attributes.title: Brave Explorer V
attributes.description: Us brave explorers can now go home and have a victory snack (and a nap)! Thanks for keeping me company!

attributes.title: Green Day I
attributes.description: You know, Farmer, green is my favorite color! Why, you ask? It's probably because everything here on the Farm is green! Just take a look around!

attributes.title: Green Day I
attributes.description: Yum, these Green Beans will be great for lunch!

attributes.title: Green Day II
attributes.description: Most kids don't like eating veggies, but I just loooove them! The greener my plate, the better!

attributes.title: Green Day II
attributes.description: Nothing better than a fresh Cucumber! Our Cattle seem to agree with me!

attributes.title: Green Day III
attributes.description: Usually Grandma or Felicia prepare food for the whole family, but I can cook some simple dishes too! And salads are my speciality!

attributes.title: Green Day III
attributes.description: Give me a minute and I'll prepare an awesome salad with a home-made dressing just for you!

attributes.title: Green Day IV
attributes.description: I feel very comfortable in the Kitchen, I know where everything is! Except, sometimes I can't reach things on higher shelves... Felicia? Can you help me?

attributes.title: Green Day IV
attributes.description: Here you go! My signature salad - what do you think?

attributes.title: Green Day V
attributes.description: And if you're still hungry I have a few more ideas, but I'll need to ask for Grandma's assistance! These recipes are complicated!

attributes.title: Green Day V
attributes.description: So, how did you like your first green day on the Farm? I had so much fun cooking for you!

attributes.title: Meaningful Flowers I
attributes.description: Howdy Farmer! Did you know that flowers have meanings associated with them? And, that there are flowers that are special for specific occasions? Let's learn more about it!

attributes.title: Meaningful Flowers I
attributes.description: A classic symbol of grace and elegance, the pink rose is often given as a token of admiration and appreciation!

attributes.title: Meaningful Flowers II
attributes.description: Nothing says "I love you" like a red rose... If you want to express your romantic feelings, better get a bouquet of red roses!

attributes.title: Meaningful Flowers II
attributes.description: Believe me, all girls love receiving roses!

attributes.title: Meaningful Flowers III
attributes.description: Blue roses do not occur in nature, at least not the absolute blue roses! Much like its mysterious origin, the blue rose means mystery and enchantment...

attributes.title: Meaningful Flowers III
attributes.description: Roses of each color have a different meaning, isn't it just crazy?

attributes.title: Meaningful Flowers IV
attributes.description: Lilies symbolize purity and refined beauty. Who would you gift a bouquet of this wonderfully fragrant flower?

attributes.title: Meaningful Flowers IV
attributes.description: Awww, thank you! You're so sweet!

attributes.title: Meaningful Flowers V
attributes.description: There's so much more to learn about flowers, but let's stop here for now and get some snacks, what do you say?

attributes.title: Meaningful Flowers V
attributes.description: It was great to discover the meaning behind different flowers with you! Now you can express your feelings even better with flowers!

attributes.title: Best Friends Forever I
attributes.description: My girlfriends and I are having a sleepover tonight! Do you know what it means? Snacks, movies, karaoke and beauty treatments!

attributes.title: Best Friends Forever I
attributes.description: It's been a long week and I'm very happy to finally relax with my besties!

attributes.title: Best Friends Forever II
attributes.description: We're gonna have cauliflower popcorn! It looks just like real popcorn but it's made of roasted cauliflower and it's much healthier! Grandma came up with this recipe!

attributes.title: Best Friends Forever II
attributes.description: Milk Facial Masks are a wonderful homemade remedy for blemishes! I prepared a lot for all of us!

attributes.title: Best Friends Forever III
attributes.description: Grandma wants me to help her transport Angora Hair to the Island. I guess we can all go and have a swim at the beach! Come on, girls! Put your swimsuits on!

attributes.title: Best Friends Forever III
attributes.description: Ahh, enjoying our own beach... One of the perks of living on a seaside farm!

attributes.title: Best Friends Forever IV
attributes.description: The next activity I planned for us is beauty DIY! We can craft our own boho earrings using feathers! Super stylish!

attributes.title: Best Friends Forever IV
attributes.description: How do I look in my new earrings? Fabulous, I know!

attributes.title: Best Friends Forever V
attributes.description: It's getting late and Grandma's calling us for dinner! She just made some fresh Beef Salami and, believe me, it's divine! Join us at the table!

attributes.title: Best Friends Forever V
attributes.description: Alrighty, it's time to start the movie! Sorry, Farmer - you're not invited, it's only us BFFs! See you around!

attributes.title: Vegan Challenge I
attributes.description: Hey Farmer! Do you want to take part in my Vegan Challenge? Don't worry, it's just for 1 day! Are you in?!

attributes.title: Vegan Challenge I
attributes.description: The calming scent of lavender will help us get in the right mood! So, what are we having for lunch?

attributes.title: Vegan Challenge II
attributes.description: I know! Grandma has a wonderful recipe for Fried Eggplants! Let's go get some fresh veggies!

attributes.title: Vegan Challenge II
attributes.description: Yummy! So far the challenge is going great! I don't mind going vegan for one day! What about you?

attributes.title: Vegan Challenge III
attributes.description: I'm a little thirsty after lunch. Do you fancy an Orange Smoothie? The one I make is so good, sometimes I sell it on the market!

attributes.text: Sell __total Orange Smoothies from the Barn

attributes.title: Vegan Challenge III
attributes.description: As usual, I made way too much! I'm glad we were able to sell the leftovers! #zerowaste

attributes.title: Vegan Challenge IV
attributes.description: Do you like Cornmeal? Guess what? It's not only vegan but also gluten free! How awesome! Let's make some.

attributes.title: Vegan Challenge IV
attributes.description: Sakura Candy for dessert! Delicious!

attributes.title: Vegan Challenge V
attributes.description: Remember that we should have at least 5 portions of fruits and veggies every day! I saw the Raspberries are ready to harvest! Let's pick some and eat them with Watermelon!

attributes.title: Vegan Challenge V
attributes.description: It was great going through this challenge with you, dear Farmer! Did you have fun too? See you later!

attributes.title: Reap What You Sow I
attributes.description: Hi Farmer, my friend at school told me he could eat five bowls of coconut rice! I bet I can out-eat him, so I've invited him to the Farm for a challenge. First, let's fill him up on Jam Sandwiches!

attributes.title: Reap What You Sow I
attributes.description: Irresistible!

attributes.title: Reap What You Sow II
attributes.description: I know he has a weakness for Peanut sauce, so let's prepare some to tempt him.

attributes.title: Reap What You Sow II
attributes.description: But what will he have with the sauce?

attributes.title: Reap What You Sow III
attributes.description: Hmm... I didn't think about that. Let's prepare some Cotton Candy and drinks for my friend instead, they're deceptively filling!

attributes.title: Reap What You Sow III
attributes.description: But what if he doesn't eat or drink?

attributes.title: Reap What You Sow IV
attributes.description: That could be a problem! Ok, let's have a backup plan. You tickle him while he eats so he can't eat as much! Quick, let's get some feathers!

attributes.text: Feed Goose __total times to produce Goose Feathers

attributes.title: Reap What You Sow IV
attributes.description: Here, you can pretend you're eating Cottage Cheese and catch him by surprise!

attributes.title: Reap What You Sow V
attributes.description: Finally, let's make the Coconut Rice and prove that I can eat the most! Can you please put more salt in his rice? That way he'll have to drink more and be full of liquid, not food!

attributes.title: Reap What You Sow V
attributes.description: Oh no... I feel sick... and he won! Even while laughing! Maybe I shouldn't have eaten so much before we started...

attributes.title: Act of Kindness I
attributes.description: Hey Farmer! Everyone at school is participating in random Acts of Kindness. Do you know what that is?

attributes.title: Act of Kindness I
attributes.description: An Act of Kindness is taking the opportunity to help someone else at no benefit to yourself.

attributes.title: Act of Kindness II
attributes.description: You can start by helping me! I'm going to sit down and write out postcards for sick children, and won't have time to do my farm chores. Can you please do them for me?

attributes.title: Act of Kindness II
attributes.description: Don't you feel better already?

attributes.title: Act of Kindness III
attributes.description: It's also important to write to the siblings of sick children, as they don't always understand what is going on. Help me prepare Chocolates to send to the sick children and their families. It's the least we can do!

attributes.title: Act of Kindness III
attributes.description: Sometimes, we focus so much on the sick that we forget about the other people who are affected.

attributes.title: Act of Kindness IV
attributes.description: Now, let's sell Pineapples and give the proceeds to the animal shelter nearby! They could always use the funds, and it's easy for us to grow Pineapples.

attributes.text: Sell __total coins worth of goods from the Barn

attributes.title: Act of Kindness IV
attributes.description: Great! They really appreciated all we could donate.

attributes.title: Act of Kindness V
attributes.description: Finally, I'm going to write a nice small note for Darryl, Grandma, and Dad telling them how much I appreciate them and nice things about them. I'll leave them with a flower on the breakfast table for them to find!

attributes.title: Act of Kindness V
attributes.description: They loved it! Farmer, who will you write a nice note to?

attributes.title: Wonderful Camping Night I
attributes.description: Hey Farmer! Let's go see that bonfire! I can see a few small rabbits singing and dancing around it.

attributes.title: Wonderful Camping Night I
attributes.description: Wow! The small animals here are speaking and walking upright.

attributes.title: Wonderful Camping Night II
attributes.description: Here it is Wonderful Animal country! And they are enjoying the beautiful evening. There's a wooden table filled with delicious cake, and a bear is preparing juice for everyone. But they need more ingredients!

attributes.title: Wonderful Camping Night II
attributes.description: After preparing the ingredients, all of the animals are sitting around the campfire, starting this wonderful evening with music.

attributes.title: Wonderful Camping Night III
attributes.description: The peacock danced first, then the lamb and the deer sang, then the swan and the rabbit performed a play... And then on my turn, I told the story of Family Farm Seaside.

attributes.text: Feed Peacock __total times to produce Peacock Feathers

attributes.title: Wonderful Camping Night III
attributes.description: After listening to my story, all of the animals want to go to our Farm and farm, cook, fish, and play with our Pets...

attributes.title: Wonderful Camping Night IV
attributes.description: After the performances, everyone decided to follow the fireflies to catch fish and shrimp in a small stream, and then dance in the sunflower field before lying down among the sunflowers to watch the stars.

attributes.title: Wonderful Camping Night IV
attributes.description: We played for a long time and everyone's stomach is growling, we must be hungry!

attributes.title: Wonderful Camping Night V
attributes.description: In order to thank everyone for their companionship, I will cook a midnight snack for everyone. Chicken? Satay? Or grilled fish? I want to eat everything!!

attributes.title: Wonderful Camping Night V
attributes.description: Ring ring ring!! That's my alarm clock! Ahhh.....It turns out that this was actually a wonderful dream!

attributes.title: Visiting Bio Farm I
attributes.description: Darryl and I have been invited to a bio farm nearby. I heard they have all organic products in their farm. What's the difference between normal products and organic products? Do you want to join us and go together?

attributes.title: Visiting Bio Farm I
attributes.description: Wow, they didn't use any fertilizer on those raspberries! They are so juicy and fresh! I'm in love with organic raspberries!

attributes.title: Visiting Bio Farm II
attributes.description: After visiting the fruit garden, it's time for lunch. What will they make us for lunch? No matter what they cook, I bet it will taste good! Ohh, they are starting to serve us the dishes! What will it be?

attributes.title: Visiting Bio Farm II
attributes.description: This Mushroom Risotto reminds me of my mushroom picking trip to the forest. Maybe next time I could invite them to go mushroom picking!

attributes.title: Visiting Bio Farm III
attributes.description: After lunch we decided to take a walk in the vegetable garden. The farmers have planted so many tomatoes and olives. They said that they will give us organic tomato sauces and organic olive face creams as souvenirs!

attributes.title: Visiting Bio Farm III
attributes.description: I can't wait to try the olive face cream. It must be good for your skin!

attributes.title: Visiting Bio Farm IV
attributes.description: Wow, there's a stable behind the bio farm, and they have a lot of horses. This is such a big farm. Can I go over there and have a look?

attributes.title: Visiting Bio Farm IV
attributes.description: Their Horse hair quality is very good. No wonder they can sell it in other countries!

attributes.title: Visiting Bio Farm V
attributes.description: The farmer asked us if we like pickles, as they are making some later. I think we should learn how to make pickles so we can make pickles for grandma, as she likes them too! What do you think, Darryl?

attributes.title: Visiting Bio Farm V
attributes.description: Sadly, it's time to leave. Thanks for inviting us to visit your organic farm. You are welcome to our Farm too, my friends!

attributes.title: Flight of Bumblebee
attributes.description: Wow, the Salad Machine is coming along really nicely! But I feel that we’re still missing something, but what? I hope Felicia has some nice ideas...let’s go ask her, but first let's feed the animals!

attributes.title: Flight of Bumblebee
attributes.description: You learned a new skill!

attributes.title: Gold Finger
attributes.description: Hi, Farmer! Are you ready for our new adventure today? I've worked outside for so long. It is time to go back and make some changes to our lovely farm now! Have a look at the lab I built for our farm!

attributes.title: Gold Finger
attributes.description: You learned a new skill! Gold Finger can help you save a lot of time!

attributes.title: Farmium Recharge
attributes.description: Get lost in all the colorful bottles and jars? Don't worry, let me explain them one by one. I think you are really curious about the purple liquid. This little thing is really important to our lab!

attributes.text: Use Flight of the Bumblebee __total times

attributes.title: Farmium Recharge
attributes.description: You learned a new skill! Be careful with the purple Farmium! With this potion you can bring magic to our farm!

attributes.title: Inventory Increase
attributes.description: Have you heard from Darryl that I have magic hands? Science is our magic! Have a look at the source of our magic, the Farmium. Did you prepare your container for it?

attributes.text: Use Flight of the Bumblebee __total times

attributes.title: Inventory Increase
attributes.description: You learned a new skill! With the container you are able to keep more farmium in the future!

attributes.title: Frugal Powder
attributes.description: Test

attributes.title: Frugal Powder
attributes.description: You learned a new skill!

attributes.title: Four-leaf Clover
attributes.description: Science is a treasure land! You will always find extra diamonds on your way. Howdy Farmer, are you still surprised about the frugal powder? Get ready for an extra benefit when you use it!

attributes.title: Four-leaf Clover
attributes.description: You learned a new skill! I'll give you some seeds and liquid fertilizer as a reward. Try to plant a rare seed!

attributes.title: Secret Recipe
attributes.description: Oh, I'm super hungry after all this scientific research. I wanna have lunch. Do you want to join me? Hush! I have a secret recipe for you. Even Grandma doesn't know about it!

attributes.text: Cook __total dishes in the Stove House.
Upgrade your Lab Storehouse to Level __total

attributes.title: Secret Recipe
attributes.description: You learned a new skill! Try it! And don't forget to share with me!

attributes.title: Glass Gem Corn
attributes.description: By the way, the Four-leaf Clover is not the only extra thing that Frugal Powder can give. Did I forget to mention that? Never mind. Forgive an old man like me who only has seven seconds memory!

attributes.title: Glass Gem Corn
attributes.description: You learned a new skill! Don't be surprised. Trust me, there are more surprises waiting for you!

attributes.title: Pumpkin Tomato
attributes.description: These skills are still not enough? Incredible! Farmer you really are curious about science. But don't worry, I still have plenty of skills waiting for you in the lab.

attributes.title: Pumpkin Tomato
attributes.description: You learned a new skill! Wow, another skill with the frugal powder. Wonderful!

attributes.title: Hainan Pepper
attributes.description: Farmer, do you need a break after all this research? Before we rest, don't miss this trick. Frugal powder can work even more magic! I can't wait to show you!

attributes.title: Hainan Pepper
attributes.description: You learned a new skill! Eureka! What beautiful luster! You made a Hainan Pepper!

attributes.title: Tree Zapper
attributes.description: Test

attributes.title: Tree Zapper
attributes.description: You learned a new skill!

attributes.title: Cubic Apple Tree
attributes.description: Welcome back farmer! I adore our farm's fresh juice. So how was your break? It's time to continue our adventure! Can you imagine the look on Grandma's face when she sees an apple tree vanish into thin air?

attributes.title: Cubic Apple Tree
attributes.description: You learned a new skill! I'll give you some seeds and liquid fertilizer as a reward. Try to plant a rare seed!

attributes.title: Secret Recipe
attributes.description: To be honest, I am a little bit hungry again. Well, it happens when I have so many skills to share. Our lab is fantastic, isn't it? Look, another secret recipe! You can share it with Grandma.

attributes.text: Cook __total dishes in the Stove House
Upgrade your Lab Storehouse to Level __total

attributes.title: Secret Recipe
attributes.description: You learned a new skill! Can I try it?

attributes.title: Surinam Cherry Tree
attributes.description: Nice choice! It seems you are interested in planting! Interest is the best teacher. It's time to put some magic on my favorite fruit, Surinam Cherry! Do you wanna use the skill you learned?

attributes.title: Surinam Cherry Tree
attributes.description: You learned a new skill! Wow, more Surinam Cherry Tree seeds!

attributes.title: Rambutan Tree
attributes.description: Science has special charm. The deeper one digs, the deeper one falls in love with it. And it will always give me surprises. Do you have the same feeling?

attributes.text: Buy __total Lychee Trees on your farm

attributes.title: Rambutan Tree
attributes.description: You learned a new skill! Keep going!

attributes.title: Diamond Lemon Tree
attributes.description: Farmer, you are one of the most curious and hardworking farmers that I've ever met. We really speak the same language! Come here now, I have one more skill to share with you.

attributes.text: Buy __total Lemon Trees on your farm

attributes.title: Diamond Lemon Tree
attributes.description: You learned a new skill! You got talent! Wasn't that easy peasy lemon squeezy?

attributes.title: Fire Bean
attributes.description: Now you are in for a nice surprise! It's more like eating fire than a bean. Have you ever tasted fire?

attributes.title: Fire Bean
attributes.description: You learned new skill now! Great work!

attributes.title: Morchella Mushroom
attributes.description: Woo! Don't let it's looks scare you! Chefs around the world love this delicious mushroom!

attributes.title: Morchella Mushroom
attributes.description: Perfect, you have learned new skill! I can't wait to eat this Morchella Mushroom!

attributes.title: Heart Watermelon
attributes.description: Looks like magic, but it's science! This Heart Watermelon will make you want to share the love. Love is in the air!

attributes.title: Heart Watermelon
attributes.description: You learned a new skill! Heart Watermelons will always make you smile!

attributes.title: Donut Peach Tree
attributes.description: I am very thirsty now. Do you have anything for me? Shall we find something from the Lab? We can make anything in the Lab!

attributes.text: Buy __total Peach Trees on your farm

attributes.title: Donut Peach Tree
attributes.description: Congrats! You have learned new skill! Donut Peach is very juicy! Be careful when you bite!

attributes.title: Sand Pear Tree
attributes.description: I will go pick some pear today! I wish I could find some special pear...

attributes.text: Buy __total Pear Trees on your farm

attributes.title: Sand Pear Tree
attributes.description: You learned a new skill! Sand pear? Sounds very interesting!

attributes.title: Crystal Olive Tree
attributes.description: Looking for something beautiful for your dish? Let's search together!

attributes.text: Buy __total Olive Trees on your farm

attributes.title: Crystal Olive Tree
attributes.description: Awesome work! You have learned new skill now. Don't worry. Crystal Olive won't be broken.

attributes.title: Activity Mission
attributes.description: Nice

attributes.title: Activity Mission
attributes.description: Nice

attributes.title: Activity Mission
attributes.description: Nice

attributes.title: Activity Mission
attributes.description: Nice

attributes.title: Activity Mission
attributes.description: Nice

attributes.text: Sell 10000 coins worth of goods from the Barn

attributes.title: Activity Mission
attributes.description: Nice
